name: Jonathan
line: Nancy! Come on, come on. Where are you?

name: Nancy
line: Jonathan! Jonathan! I'm right here!

name: Jonathan
line: Nancy! Follow my voice, Nancy, I'm right here!

name: Nancy
line: Jonathan, where are you? I'm right here!

name: Jonathan
line: Just follow my voice! I'm right here!

name: Unknown
line: I just don't understand why we're coming out here. She obviously doesn't wanna talk to you.

name: Steve
line: That's not it. She was acting weird. I mean, something was wrong.

name: Unknown
line: Oh, really? Because no girl would ever blow off King Steve. So what? Like, you're worried about her?

name: Steve
line: What?

name: Unknown
line: Aw, you are. Aw, Steve has a heart. Oh, Stevey's in love. Who knew?

name: Steve
line: Would you just stop? Would you just shut up?

name: Carol
line: Damn. Sorry.

name: Steve
line: So this is it, huh? Princess' castle. I'll just be a minute.

name: Joyce
line: Look, we gotta go through this again.

name: Hopper
line: I told you everything that I saw. Upstairs. There was a laboratory. It was where they must do experiments or something, and then there was this kid's room.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, gosh. Tell me again. How do you know it was a kid's room?

name: Hopper
line: More like a prison. The size of the bed, there was a drawing, there was a stuffed animal.

name: Joyce
line: You didn't say there was a drawing.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, there was a drawing of an adult and a child. It said 'Eleven' on it.

name: Joyce
line: Was it good?

name: Hopper
line: It was a kid's drawing, Joyce. It was stick figures. Wasn't Will.

name: Joyce
line: Earl... The night that Benny died, Earl said he saw some kid with a shaved head with Benny. Now, I pressed him, he said it might be Will, but maybe it wasn't?

name: Hopper
line: Look, this woman, Terry Ives, she claims to have lost her daughter, Jane. She sued Brenner, she sued the government. Now, the claims came to nothing, but what if I mean, what if this whole time I've been looking for Will, I've been chasing after some other kid?

name: Nancy
line: Better?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah.

name: Nancy
line: Is this okay? Uh, I found it in the closet. I can go home. I just figured...

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, no. I don’t wanna be alone.

name: Nancy
line: Do you?

name: Jonathan
line: No. Uh... no.

name: Nancy
line: Can you just come up here?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah.

name: Nancy
line: Do you want the lights off, or...

name: Jonathan
line: On.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. You know, it can’t get us in here.

name: Jonathan
line: We don't know that.

name: Hopper
line: Uh, yeah, it’s Ives. Terry Ives. That’s with a 'Y.' Yeah, I got a pen. Hang on. Great, thanks. I really appreciate this, Frank. Say hi to the boys for me, too, would you?

name: Joyce
line: Did you get it?

name: Hopper
line: I got it.

name: Nancy
line: Hey. Couldn’t sleep?

name: Jonathan
line: Every time I close my eyes, I just keep seeing that thing.

name: Nancy
line: Wherever I was, that place I think that it lives there. It was feeding there. Feeding on that deer. That means that if Will and Barbara...

name: Jonathan
line: Hey. My mom said she talked to Will. If he’s alive, there’s a chance Barbara is, too.

name: Nancy
line: That means that she’s trapped in that place. We have to find it again.

name: Jonathan
line: You wanna go back out there?

name: Nancy
line: Maybe we don’t have to. When I saw it, it was feeding on that deer. Meaning it’s a predator, right?

name: Jonathan
line: Right.

name: Nancy
line: And it seems to hunt at night, like a lion or a coyote. But it doesn’t hunt in packs like them. It’s always alone, like a bear. And remember at Steve’s, when Barb cut herself? And then, last night, the deer it was bleeding, too.

name: Jonathan
line: One sec. Sharks can detect blood in one part per million. That’s one drop of blood in a million, and they can smell it from a quarter mile away.

name: Nancy
line: So you’re saying it can detect blood?

name: Jonathan
line: It’s just a theory.

name: Nancy
line: We could test it. But if it works at least we’ll know it’s coming.

name: Karen
line: Honey, are you up?

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, I’m I’m getting dressed.

name: Karen
line: I, uh, made some blueberry pancakes.

name: Nancy
line: I’ll be down in a second.

name: Jonathan
line: Your mom doesn’t knock?

name: Unknown
line: Hi. Scott Clarke?

name: Scott
line: Uh, yes.

name: Unknown
line: The same Scott Clarke who teaches science and AV at Hawkins Middle?

name: Scott
line: The very same.

name: Unknown
line: Oh, wonderful. And we’re making a newsletter, which we’ll send out monthly. It’ll showcase all the latest equipment, as well as how-to articles, which the kids write themselves.

name: Scott
line: Oh, that’s neat.

name: Unknown
line: What we’re really trying to do here, Mr. Clarke Scott what we’re trying to do here, Scott, is to connect kids from all over the state and give them the support and encouragement to pursue careers in technology. We feel these are the kinds of kids that are going to make Indiana proud.

name: Scott
line: I agree, yes. Completely.

name: Unknown
line: So, you know any kids you think might wanna participate?

name: Scott
line: Oh, I have a few in mind.

name: Mike
line: I just I can’t believe she didn’t come back.

name: Dustin
line: She’s gotta be close. She said it wasn’t safe. She just messed up the compasses because she wanted to protect us. She didn’t betray us.

name: Mike
line: Mike, calm down. I shouldn’t have yelled at her. I never should’ve done that.

name: Dustin
line: Mike, this isn’t your fault.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, it’s Lucas’.

name: Dustin
line: It wasn’t his fault, either. He wasn’t way out of line? Totally, but so were you! And so was Eleven.

name: Mike
line: Oh, give me a break!

name: Dustin
line: No, Mike, you give me a break! All three of you were being a bunch of little assholes! I was the only reasonable one. But the bottom line is you pushed first. And you know the rule. You draw first blood no way! I’m not shaking his hand.

name: Mike
line: No, I’m not.

name: Dustin
line: This isn’t a discussion. This is the rule of law. Obey or be banished from the party. Do you wanna be banished?

name: Mike
line: No.

name: Dustin
line: Good. Where are we going?

name: Mike
line: Where do you think? We’re going to get Lucas. And then we’re gonna find Eleven.

name: Unknown
line: Today is a very special day. Do you know why? Because today, we make history. Today, we make contact.

name: Karen
line: Here you go.

name: Unknown
line: Ah yum.

name: Karen
line: Okay. Now, sweetie, swallow the pancake. Where is Nancy? I thought she was coming down.

name: Unknown
line: She is. Uh, she was. I don’t know.

name: Karen
line: Nancy, what’s taking so long? Nancy? Nancy, come on.

name: Mike
line: What do you want?

name: Lucas
line: I drew first blood, so okay, I’ll shake. On one condition. We forget the weirdo and go straight to the gate.

name: Mike
line: Then the deal’s off.

name: Lucas
line: Fine!

name: Mike
line: Fine!

name: Dustin
line: No, no, not fine! Guys, seriously? Do you even remember what happened on the Bloodstone Pass?

name: Lucas
line: We couldn’t agree on what path to take, so we split up the party and those trolls took us out one by one. And it all went to shit. And we were all disabled! So we stick together, no matter what!

name: Mike
line: Yeah, I agree. But this is the party, right here in this room. El is one of us now.

name: Lucas
line: Um, no, she’s not. Not even close! Never will be. She’s a liar, a traitor she was just trying to keep us safe! She didn’t mean to hurt you. It was an accident!

name: Mike
line: An accident?

name: Lucas
line: All right, accident or not admit it, it was a little awesome.

name: Mike
line: Awesome?

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, she threw you in the air with her mind!

name: Mike
line: I could have been killed! Which is exactly why we need her. She’s a weapon! Do you seriously wanna fight the Demogorgon with your wrist rocket? That’s like R2-D2 going to fight Darth Vader. We’re no use to Will if we’re dead.

name: Lucas
line: If you two wanna waste your time looking for a traitor, go ahead, ‘cause I’m not spending my time on her anymore. No way! I’m going to the gate. I’m gonna find Will.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: It’s okay, Eleven. Don’t be frightened. These are all friends. They’re just here to watch. Don’t focus on them. Stay in here, like before.

name: Eleven
line: Yes, Papa.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Now, remember. Whatever it is, it can’t hurt you. Not from here. So there’s nothing to be frightened of. It’s reaching out to you ‘cause it wants you. It’s calling you so don’t turn away from it this time. I want you to find it. Understand?

name: Eleven
line: Yes.

name: Man
line: Are you lost? Is your mom here? Your dad?

name: Eleven
line: Mouth breather.

name: Unknown
line: What should we do?

name: Man
line: Uh call the police.

name: Unknown
line: Excuse me. Young lady! You know you have to pay for those! You have to pay for those! Stop right there! Thief! Thief!

name: Becky
line: Hi, we’re looking for Terry Ives. Does she live here?

name: Hopper
line: The Hawkins chief of police.

name: Becky
line: And you want to talk to my sister? Okay, well, you can come in, but if you want Terry to tell you anything, you’re about five years too late.

name: Joyce
line: Terry, you have some visitors. Hello. My name’s Joyce Byers. Uh, this is Hopper. We drove over from Hawkins. Um, you see, uh, my son he’s been missing for almost a week now, and, um, we were wondering if we could talk to you about your daughter, Jane? If there’s anything that you could tell us about when she was taken what was your relationship with Dr. Brenner? You guys keep in touch?

name: Hopper
line: This is, uh this is him. This is Will. Uh, you may have seen him on on the news.

name: Joyce
line: What’s wrong with her?

name: Becky
line: I told you, you’re wasting your time.

name: Dustin
line: This is weird without Lucas.

name: Mike
line: He should’ve shaken my hand.

name: Dustin
line: He’s just jealous. Sometimes, your total obliviousness just blows my mind. He’s your best friend, right?

name: Mike
line: Yeah I mean, I don’t know.

name: Dustin
line: It’s fine. I get it. I didn’t get here until the fourth grade. He had the advantage of living next door. But none of that matters. What matters is that he is your best friend. And then this girl shows up and starts living in your basement, and all you ever want to do is pay attention to her.

name: Mike
line: That’s not true.

name: Dustin
line: Yes, it is. And you know it. And he knows it. But no one ever says anything until you both start punching and yelling at each other like goblins with intelligence scores of zero. Now everything’s weird.

name: Mike
line: He’s not my best friend.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, right.

name: Mike
line: I mean, he is, but so are you. And so is Will.

name: Dustin
line: Can’t have more than one best friend.

name: Mike
line: Says who?

name: Dustin
line: Says logic.

name: Mike
line: Well, I call bull on your logic, because you’re my best friend, too.

name: Dustin
line: Okay.

name: Becky
line: She was a part of some study in college.

name: Hopper
line: MK Ultra?

name: Becky
line: Yeah, that’s the one. Was, uh, started in the ‘50s. By the time Terry got involved, it was supposed to be ramping down, but the drugs just got crazier. Messed her up good.

name: Hopper
line: This was the CIA that ran this?

name: Becky
line: You and Terry would’ve gotten along. 'The Man,' with a big capital 'M.' They’d pay a couple hundred bucks to people like my sister, give ‘em drugs, psychedelics. LSD, mostly. And then they’d strip her naked and put her in these isolation tanks.

name: Hopper
line: Isolation tanks?

name: Becky
line: Yeah. These big bathtubs, basically, filled with salt water, so you can float around in there. You lose any sense of sense and feel nothing, see nothing. They wanted to expand the boundaries of the mind. Real hippie crap. I mean, it’s not like they were forcing her to do any of this stuff. The thing is, though, is that she didn’t know she was pregnant at the time.

name: Hopper
line: Jane.

name: Joyce
line: Do you have any pictures of her?

name: Becky
line: I don’t think you guys understand. Terry miscarried in the third trimester. She keeps all of this up. Been doing it for 12 years. Terry, uh, pretends like Jane is real, like she’s gonna come home someday. Says she’s special. Born with 'abilities.'

name: Hopper
line: Abilities?

name: Becky
line: You read any Stephen King? Telepathy, telekinesis you know, shit you can do with your mind. That’s why the big, bad Man stole Jane away. Her baby’s a weapon, off fighting the commies. You know, the doctors all say it’s a coping mechanism. You know, to deal with the guilt.

name: Hopper
line: Do you think there is any chance she could be telling the truth? About having had the kid.

name: Becky
line: There is no birth certificate, nothing from the hospital. Doctors and nurses all confirm that she miscarried.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, but that could’ve been covered up. Right?

name: Becky
line: Like I said, you and Terry would’ve gotten along.

name: Nancy
line: And I’ll have four boxes of the .38s.

name: Unknown
line: What you kids doin’ with all this?

name: Nancy
line: Monster hunting.

name: Unknown
line: Huh. 'Monster hunting'?

name: Nancy
line: You know, last week I was shopping for a new top I thought Steve might like. It took me and Barb all weekend. It seemed like life or death, you know? And and now

name: Jonathan
line: You’re shopping for bear traps with Jonathan Byers.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah.

name: Jonathan
line: What’s the weirdest part? Me or the bear trap?

name: Nancy
line: You. It’s definitely you.

name: Reed
line: Hey, Nance! Can’t wait to see your movie.

name: Nancy
line: What the hell was that?

name: Jonathan
line: I don’t know.

name: Carol
line: Tommy, you write like a three-year-old.

name: Tommy
line: Shut up!

name: Nicole
line: I didn’t know you could spell.

name: Carol
line: Aw, hey there, princess!

name: Tommy
line: Uh-oh! She looks upset.

name: Nancy
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Steve
line: What’s wrong with me? What’s wrong with you? I was worried about you. I can’t believe that I was actually worried about you.

name: Nancy
line: What are you talking about?

name: Steve
line: I wouldn’t lie if I were you. You don’t want to be known as the lying slut now, do you?

name: Tommy
line: Speak of the devil.

name: Nancy
line: You came by last night?

name: Steve
line: Ding! Ding! Ding! Does she get a prize? Look, I don’t know what you think you saw, but it wasn’t like that.

name: Nancy
line: What, you just let him into your room to study? We were just

name: Steve
line: Or for another pervy photo session? You were just what? Finish that sentence. Finish the sentence.

name: Nancy
line: Go to hell, Nancy.

name: Jonathan
line: Come on, Nancy, let’s just leave.

name: Steve
line: You know what, Byers? I’m actually kind of impressed. I always took you for a queer, but I guess you’re just a little screw-up like your father. Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Yeah, that house is full of screw-ups. You know, I guess I shouldn’t really be surprised. A bunch of screw-ups in your family. I mean, your mom I’m not even surprised what happened to your brother.

name: Nancy
line: Steve, shut up!

name: Steve
line: I’m sorry I have to be the one to tell you, but the Byers, their family, it’s a disgrace to the entire

name: Nancy
line: Jonathan, leave it.

name: Tommy
line: Get in there, he’s going to hurt himself!

name: Carol
line: Get off of him, seriously! Get off! Stop!

name: Nancy
line: Stop! Steve! Knock it off, you guys! Jonathan, stop! Stop! You’re going to hurt him! Guys Jonathan, get off of him! Stop it! You have to stop!

name: Tommy
line: Cops! Cops! Come on! Just go, Carol!

name: Unknown
line: Hey. Hey! Get out of here! Get out of here! Get out of here! He’s had enough, man! I said he’s had enough!

name: Callahan
line: Kids! All right! Oh! My nose! Get back here! Get back here, you little punks!

name: Powell
line: Calm him down!

name: Jonathan
line: Get off!

name: Hopper
line: Well, thank you for your time. We appreciate it.

name: Becky
line: Hmm, yeah, I’m sorry I couldn’t be of more help.

name: Hopper
line: Good luck.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah, like Terry found her daughter?

name: Hopper
line: We’re close. And then she shows up at Benny’s five nights ago, which means we’ve got a chance.

name: Joyce
line: You know what I would give? For a chance? You know what I would give?

name: Callahan
line: Hey, Chief, you there? Yeah, a fight broke out here and it’s Jonathan Byers. You haven’t seen Joyce, have you?

name: Unknown
line: Do you think we’ll be out of here soon?

name: Callahan
line: You, yes. Him, no. He assaulted a police officer.

name: Nancy
line: Well, how long are you gonna keep him?

name: Callahan
line: You and your boyfriend have big plans, do you?

name: Nancy
line: He’s not my boyfriend.

name: Callahan
line: I think you better tell him that. Only love makes you that crazy, sweetheart. And that damn stupid.

name: Nancy
line: Found some ice.

name: Jonathan
line: Thanks.

name: Nancy
line: Everything okay?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. Everything’s fine.

name: Dustin
line: El!

name: Mike
line: Eleven! El! Eleven!

name: Dustin
line: Hey, stop. Do you hear that?

name: Mike
line: El?

name: Troy
line: Hey, there, Frogface.

name: Dustin
line: Toothless.

name: Mike
line: Shit! Run, Mike!

name: Dustin
line: Move, Mike! Mike, come on, run!

name: Troy
line: You’re dead, Wheeler.

name: Dustin
line: Just keep going! Keep going!

name: Mike
line: Stay back! Don’t come any closer!

name: Troy
line: Nice throw, numbnuts. Stay back, or I cut him! I want to know how you did it!

name: Mike
line: How I did what?

name: Troy
line: I know you did something to me. Some nerdy science shit to make me do that.

name: Mike
line: You mean piss your pants?

name: Dustin
line: Our friend has superpowers, and she squeezed your tiny bladder with her mind.

name: Troy
line: Shut up! I think I should save Toothless here a trip to the dentist. Help him lose the rest of his baby teeth.

name: Mike
line: Let him go. Let him go!

name: Troy
line: I’ll let him go, sure. But first it’s your turn. Wet yourself. Jump or Toothless here gets an early trip to the dentist.

name: Dustin
line: Stop! No! Mike, don’t do it. I don’t need my baby teeth, Mike! Mike, seriously, don’t!

name: James
line: Troy, I don’t think this is a good idea, man.

name: Troy
line: Dentist’s office opens in five four! Three! Two! One!

name: Dustin
line: Mike, don’t! Seriously, don’t do it, man! Seriously, don’t! Mike!

name: Mike
line: Holy shit.

name: Troy
line: She broke my arm! My arm! Let’s get out of here! Let’s go!

name: James
line: Go!

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, that’s right! You better run! She’s our friend and she’s crazy! You come back here and she’ll kill you! You hear me? She’ll kill you, you sons of bitches! She’ll kill you, you hear me?

name: Mike
line: El, are you okay? El?

name: Eleven
line: Mike I’m sorry.

name: Mike
line: Sorry? What are you sorry for?

name: Eleven
line: The gate I opened it. I’m the monster.

name: Mike
line: No. No, El, you’re not the monster. You saved me. Do you understand? You saved me.

name: Unknown
line: I have eyes on ‘em now. They’re heading home.
